secondaries.shortDescription: At your first command phase, target on of your Blood Angel CHARACTER, opponent target one of his CHARACTER (if no character then the warlord). 5pts when the opponent model targeted is destroyed, +5pts if it was by a melee attack, +5pts if the melee attack came from your own targeted unit

subObjectives.description: Unit opponent targeted is killed by melee attack
Unit opponent targeted is killed by melee attack by your own targeted unit

secondaries.shortDescription: Score 3 points at the end of your turn if 1+ enemy units have been destroyed by one of your Death Company unit

subObjectives.description: You destroyed 1+ enemy units with one of your Death Company unit

secondaries.shortDescription: (2 pts) is enemy unit killed by a Blood Angels unit that was set up during the reinforcement step of any movement phase. If it was CHARACTER (3pts).

subObjectives.description: 1+ enemy unit destroyed by a unit placed during reinforcement step this turn
At least 1 CHARACTER destroyed by a unit placed during reinforcement step this turn

secondaries.shortDescription: Score 4 points at the end of the round if you have more Blood Angels units in the enemy deployment zone than there are enemy units in yours

subObjectives.description: You have more units in the enemy deployment zone than the enemy has in your deployment
